title: Lesson 4
paragraph: Travel involves planning routes, tickets and luggage. Whether you take a flight, train, coach or subway, checking schedules and following customs rules helps the journey go smoothly. Keeping your boarding pass, baggage tags and reservation details handy reduces stress at the airport or station.
